summary: A female Orc character preset for your enjoyment!
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][size=4][b]This file is a [i]Nexus exclusive[/i]. If it is found anywhere, including Bethesda.net (as I do have an account there), and is not uploaded by me, it is stolen. Please report any stolen mods you see. :)[/b]

[img]http://i989.photobucket.com/albums/af11/selenameeka/72850_screenshots_20161014130011_1.jpg[/img]

[/size]
This mod is free for you to use as a template or to use as your own character's face. If you like her, please endorse, maybe comment, and enjoy!

I think she was unintentionally inspired by DrowofShadow's Orc from her own package: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79532/?]Drow's Character Presets[/url]. Download her's! So many great faces!! :D

Mods used in the screenshots:
Hair: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSky Hair[/url] for Females (the female specific .esp)
Skin:[size=3][size=3] [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/seren4xx/15342092530]SRG Skin[/url] - you can also use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG skin[/url]. Looks good, too. I use SRG's more muscle variant.[/size][/size]
Eyes: Vanilla
Eyebrows: Vanilla
Body: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]UNP[/url] (just my preference, she'll work with any body).
Scar: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49279/?]Northborn Scars[/url]


Installation:
Requires Racemenu and SKSE!
1. Open your Data folder in Skyrim
2. Download this file
3. Open Hathor and copy all the files from the data folder to your Skyrim's data folder[/size]
author: selenameeka
